title: [The Hair Appeal, Entry]
description: Loose knotty oak boards, grey and cracked with age, hang off-kilter from the wall supports and allow moonlight to spill upon the raised boards of the floor.  Exposed rafters hold up a thatched roof that has large holes where antiquated straw has rotted away.  Debris piled upon the floor between posts defines were aging walls once stood, while chains strung between the old supports dangle woven baskets that hold wares.
